name: Xmas Angel
temple_description:
Who says only an older man with white beard would appear on Christmas Eve? Look at her. The passionate, beautiful, and everyoneâ€™s favorite Xmas Angel! On that peaceful night, she drives the Christmas Reindeer in the snowy sky, lending support to people in need. Remember to check your pockets when she leaves.
You will be amazed to see how many gifts she managed to stuff with that little space.

active_skills.name: Frozen Snow
active_skills.effect: Inflicts [Weaken], reducing ATK by 30%; guaranteed CRIT against enemies in [Freeze] state

active_skills.name: Arrow of Surprise
active_skills.effect: 80% chance to [Freeze] debuffed enemies, disabling movement
